welcome_message_body: Welcome to Jagdalpur, the charming city in the heart of Chhattisgarh, known for its stunning natural beauty, lush greenery, and vibrant tribal culture. We hope you'll enjoy your time exploring the city and all it has to offer!

restaurants.name: extra class
restaurants.description: extra class is a indian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Mayuri Hotel
restaurants.description: Mayuri Hotel is a indian restaurant located in Jagdalpur.

restaurants.name: Pandey Dhaba
restaurants.description: Pandey Dhaba is a indian restaurant located in Jagdalpur.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Jagdalpur Airport handles all domestic flights and is equipped with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Jagdalpur Airport is responsible for handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
